animeTitle: Sidonia no Kishi: Daikyuu Wakusei Seneki
otherNames: Knights of Sidonia: Battle for Planet Nine, シドニアの騎士 第九惑星戦役
synopsis: Having narrowly avoided the collision with the asteroid, the Sidonia sets a course for the Lem system in order to wipe out the Gauna nest.
